{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=EA-AC87 |revision=A1 |upc= |ean= |asin=B010QDFITS,B01560A5FI |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/03/2014 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Arcadyan |manuf_model=WA5005A |manuf_rev=AC44-ASU |availability=common |type=media bridge, access point |fcc_id=MSQ-EAAC87 |ic_id=3568A-EAAC87 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Quantenna |cpu1_model=QT3840BC |cpu1_cspeed=500 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12845EMI-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=ESMT |ram1_model=M15F1G1664A-ADB |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag=yes,, 7-pin header,, unpopulated,, |serial=yes,, internal,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200,8,N,1),, |wi1_chip1_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip1_model=QT3840BC |wi1_chip2_brand=Quantenna |wi1_chip2_model=QT2518B |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=5 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=5GHz Power Amplifier;Skyworks;SKY85405-11;;4; ,,, 5GHz SPDT Switch;Skyworks;SKY13370-374LF;;4; |flags=MU-MIMO, signal-quality indicators |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=an+ac |default_ssid=ASUS_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=10:C3:7B |oui_eth=10:C3:7B }}
:• '''1733Mbps''' - 4-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream) = '''''1800 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|5GHz Wireless AC1800 Media Bridge / Access Point}} :[http://www.asus.com/Networks/Wireless_Adapters/EAAC87/ Product page] The device can operate as a Media Bridge or a Access Point. :AP: http://findasus.local (http://www.asusrouter.com) :SSID: ASUS_5G "AW5005AAC44-ASU", "HannStar", "1505" (02/2015), ''ASUS'' logo and :"EA-AC87 REV 1.40" is silkscreened on the board in the photos. {{see also|Arcadyan|ASUS RT-AC87U}} {{WiFiCert|WFA55379|06/27/2014}} ==Additional external links== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.ixbt.com/comm/asus-ea-ac87.shtml ''Asus EA-AC87 Review'' on '''iXBT'''] (RU) :CPU: [[Quantenna]] QT3840BC @500MHz SoC (Argonaut RISC) :WLAN: [[Quantenna]] QT2518B 802.11ac 4T4R (1733Mbps) :RAM: 128MB, Flash: 16MB, Switch: [[Realtek]] RTL8367RB *[https://klseet.com/index.php/234-tm-unifi/unifi-asus/ea-ac87/315-asus-ea-ac87 ''Asus EA-AC87 Review'' on '''K.L.Seet'''] *[http://foxnetlab.com/index.php/16-reviews/145-asus-ea-ac87 ''Asus EA-AC87 Review'' on '''FoxNetLab'''] :Flash: ''Macronix'' MX25L12845EMI-10G 16MB (SPI) :5GHz Power Amplifier: 4x [[Skyworks]] SKY85405-11 ([https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2375093 FCC images]) :5GHz SPDT Switch: 4x [[Skyworks]] SKY13370-374LF (SKY3370) *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/network/apoints/asus-ea-ac87-mediabridge-r217/ ''Asus EA-AC87 Review'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) ===Forum threads=== * [http://koolshare.cn/thread-595-1-1.html Reviewed on '''KoolShare''' forums] (CN) (internal images) : [[Quantenna]] [http://www.quantenna.com/qsr-1000.html QSR1000] @500MHz ARC 700 Dual on-chip processors : [[Quantenna]] QSR1000 (QV840/HS800): SoC QT3840BC + RFIC QT2518B ===Blogs=== * [http://pcdiy.asus.com/2014/01/rt-ac87u-the-ultimate-router-4x4-mu-mimo-ces-2014/ ''RT-AC87U The Ultimate Router 4×4 MU-MIMO – CES 2014'' @ '''ASUS'''' PCDiY blog] ===Press releases=== * [http://www.quantenna.com/pressrelease-01_06_14_2.html ''Quantenna Powers World’s Fastest 802.11ac Dual-Band Wave 2 ASUS RT-AC87U Router'' - '''Quantenna''' press release] ===Other=== * [http://fccid.net/pdf.php?id=2332305 FCC doc w/ more details about the Quantenna QV840 chipset] (via an '''Actiontec''' filing) :This module is noted to contain a small 64KB SPI Flash w/ not :much else on-board besides the bootloader and calibration data. :The main firmware is uploaded to the device via its RGMII interface. * [http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces-2014/32309-asus-ac2300-router-coming ''ASUS AC2300 Router Coming'' @ '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :Wave 2, AC2400 :4x4 MU-MIMO 802.11ac :IEEE 802.11ac: 5 GHz (80MHz) 4T4R 1700 Mbps *[http://www.heise.de/newsticker/meldung/WLAN-mit-1700-MBit-s-2076151.html ''WLAN mit 1700 MBit/s'' @ '''heise.de''' (DE)] *[http://www.heise.de/newsticker/meldung/Erster-Chipsatz-fuer-11ac-WLAN-mit-4-MIMO-Streams-1869136.html ''Erster Chipsatz für 11ac-WLAN mit 4 MIMO-Streams'' @ '''heise.de''' (DE)] ===See also=== {{ASUS AC products}} ==Images== ===@ koolshare.cn=== * [http://koolshare.cn/data/attachment/forum/201408/07/111700jhhcx1yihizrihyi.jpg Board top] * [http://koolshare.cn/data/attachment/forum/201408/07/111700u9d48ksne8o0pd09.jpg Board bottom] * [http://koolshare.cn/data/attachment/forum/201408/07/111700w83ykx2zyz27kvyr.jpg RTL8367RB GbE Switch] * [http://koolshare.cn/data/attachment/forum/201408/08/151306u5qhhxoj99o9vaj7.png Block diagram] __NOTOC__
